oracle text:
2/2
When Banana Wizard enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
Whenever you tap a Forest for mana, add an additional G to your mana pool.

(Explanation: This card symbolizes the idea of a wizard who has harnessed the power of nature to cast spells. Bananas are often associated with jungles and forests, hence the forest-related abilities. The card is strong but has balanced mechanics that take some setup to be activated.)
